title: 'Stealing Fire: Peak States and Ethical Cult Building' Jamie Wheal
description:
How do we use the most powerful consciousness hacking tools to transform ourselves and our lives, and what are the dangers? Jamie Wheal wrote the 'how to' manual for applied ecstasy, "Stealing Fire", he describes the positive and negative effects of altered states and community.

More useful links:

Bret Weinstein and Jamie Wheal discuss Evolution, the Intellectual Dark Web and the future of humanity: https://youtu.be/KigJ5rn-4yE

'Jordan Peterson, Truth in the Time of Chaos': https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EjqXXengN1s&t=5s

'Glitch in the Matrix': https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=trhTbEs2GGE&t=2902s

Rebel Wisdom is a new media platform asking the biggest questions: http://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/

If you like what we are doing, please consider supporting us on Patreon: https://patreon.com/rebelwisdom
